info.author: Bruno Fortunato
info.name: persona_ai
info.summary: Persona is a groundbreaking distributed AI agent system utilizing Google Vertex AI's premier Large Language Models such as Gemini-pro, Text-Bison, and Code-Bison. Developed by Applica Software Guru, Persona is engineered for scalable, high-performance, and intelligent operations across various data sets and applications. It harnesses the power of Google's Vertex AI to deliver unmatched insights and automation capabilities, setting new standards in AI-driven analytics and decision-making processes
